nodes.text: Star Wars Celebration Anaheim is planned to be the fourteenth Celebration convention. It was originally scheduled for August 27–30, 2020 in Anaheim, California, but was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic, and rescheduled for the same location in 2022, the year marking the 45th anniversary of the Star Wars franchise. On May 13, 2021, it was announced on StarWars.com that the Celebration was now scheduled for May 26–29, 2022.
